\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trespass-offering: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* certainly guilty before \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.
